author: Charlie Spiering, Charlie Spiering
title: Donald Trump: Louisiana Coronavirus Cases 'Went Like a Rocket Ship'
description: President Donald Trump said Tuesday at the White House the sudden rise in coronavirus cases in Louisiana demonstrated the lethality of the virus
content:
President Donald Trump said Tuesday at the White House the sudden rise in coronavirus cases in Louisiana demonstrated the lethality of the virus
“I love that state and I’m saying they’re in great shape than they have Mardi Gras. It was a big success. Tremend… [+1611 chars]
